term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - retention efficiency in particle separation
term.title: retention efficiency

item.text: The ratio of the quantity of particles retained by a separator to the quantity entering it (generally expressed as a percentage).

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2211 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
